overview: Lesbians in love in different situations! Some girls are curious but can't see themselves being with another girl. Riley Reid and her friends find themselves in different lesbian scenarios that lead to a finger-licking experience they won't soon forget!  Avril and Sara break away from a slumber party so Avril can worship Sara's body. Riley is apprehensive about all the lesbians around her so Chloe decides to teach her the ways of female love. Nikki Hearts is running a sex toy party for Aryana, Adriana and Hope. Hope is a prude but Adriana wants to corrupt her.
title: Lesbian Love Stories 4
